mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE HH_RECORD ( NO INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT , ENABLED CHAR(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Y' CHECK (ENABLED IN ('Y', 'N')) , REG_DATE DATE DEFAULT (DATETIME('NOW','LOCALTIME')) , DEAL_DATE DATE NOT NULL , AMOUNT INTEGER(12) NOT NULL , INCLUDED CHAR(1) NOT NULL CHECK(INCLUDED IN ('T', 'F')) , IN_OUT CHAR(1) NOT NULL CHECK(IN_OUT IN ('I', 'O')) , BANK_CARD_NO INTEGER NOT NULL , CATEGORY_NO INTEGER NOT NULL , STORE_NO INTEGER DEFAULT -1 , CONTENT TEXT(128) DEFAULT NULL , DESCRIPTION TEXT(256) DEFAULT NULL , HASH INTEGER DEFAULT 0 , OWNER_RECORD_NO INTEGER DEFAULT -1 , FOREIGN KEY(BANK_CARD_NO) REFERENCES HH_BANK_CARD(NO) , FOREIGN KEY(CATEGORY_NO) REFERENCES HH_CATEGORY(NO) , FOREIGN KEY(STORE_NO) REFERENCES HH_USAGE_STORE(NO) )

CREATE TABLE HH_RECORD_TEMP ( NO INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT , DEAL_DATE DATE NOT NULL , AMOUNT INTEGER(12) NOT NULL , INCLUDED CHAR(1) NOT NULL CHECK(INCLUDED IN ('T', 'F')) , IN_OUT CHAR(1) NOT NULL CHECK(IN_OUT IN ('I', 'O')) , BANK_CARD_NO INTEGER NOT NULL , CATEGORY_NO INTEGER NOT NULL , STORE_NO INTEGER DEFAULT -1 , CONTENT TEXT(128) DEFAULT NULL , DESCRIPTION TEXT(256) DEFAULT NULL , HASH INTEGER DEFAULT 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT HR.NO ,HR.DEAL_DATE ,HR.AMOUNT ,HR.IN_OUT ,HR.BANK_CARD_NO ,HR.CATEGORY_NO ,HR.STORE_NO ,HR.CONTENT ,HR.DESCRIPTION ,HR.HASH FROM HH_RECORD HR INNER JOIN HH_RECORD_TEMP TMP ON 1=1 AND HR.HASH = TMP.HASH WHERE 1=1 AND HR.ENABLED = 'Y' AND HR.INCLUDED = 'T' AND HR.DEAL_DATE BETWEEN DATE(#{begin, typeHandler=com.utime.household.dataIO.handler.DealDateTypeHandler}) AND DATE(#{end, typeHandler=com.utime.household.dataIO.handler.DealDateTypeHandler}, '+1 DAY') ORDER BY HR.DEAL_DATE ASC ,HR.NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HH_RECORD ( DEAL_DATE , AMOUNT , INCLUDED , IN_OUT , BANK_CARD_NO , CATEGORY_NO , STORE_NO , CONTENT , DESCRIPTION , HASH ) SELECT DEAL_DATE , AMOUNT , INCLUDED , IN_OUT , BANK_CARD_NO , CATEGORY_NO , STORE_NO , CONTENT , DESCRIPTION , HASH FROM HH_RECORD_TEMP TMP WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM HH_RECORD HR WHERE 1=1 AND HR.HASH = TMP.HASH AND HR.DEAL_DATE BETWEEN DATE(#{begin, typeHandler=com.utime.household.dataIO.handler.DealDateTypeHandler}) AND DATE(#{end, typeHandler=com.utime.household.dataIO.handler.DealDateTypeHandler}, '+1 DAY') )
